title: Elon Musk Waging ‘Unlawful Harassment Campaign’ in Dogecoin Lawsuit, Says Attorney
description: The billionaire's legal team is using a "bottomless war chest" to fund its dirty tactics, the Dogecoin investors' attorney claims.

title: First European Bitcoin ETF set to launch this month after 12-month delay
description:
Jacobi Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF), the first European BTC ETF,  is set to launch later this month on Euronext Amsterdam, Financial Times reported on July 13. Jacobi Asset Management reportedly stated that the fund was “on track” for listing this month as there was now demand for it following its initial 12-month-long hiatus because […]

The post First European Bitcoin ETF set to launch this month after 12-month delay appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ethereum ($ETH) Tops Crypto ESG Ranking, Ahead of Solana ($SOL), Cardano ($ADA), and $XRP
description: The second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization Ethereum ($ETH) has topped the first institutional grade cryptocurrency ESG ranking, in which it was followed by rival smart contract platforms Solana ($SOL) and Cardano ($ADA). title: US Judge Rules XRP ‘Not Necessarily a Security on Its Face,’ Sending XRP Supporters Into Celebration
description: According to a recent ruling handed down by U.S. judge Analisa Torres the crypto asset XRP is not “necessarily a security on its face.” In the ruling, both parties, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and Ripple Labs’ motions for summary judgment were granted in part and denied in part. title: Stablecoin issuers in Europe advised to start complying before 2024
description: The European Banking Authority (EBA) is urging stablecoin issuers to voluntarily comply with proposed guidelines ahead of the mandatory enforcement of crypto-asset regulations

title: Binance appoints new general counsel to lead a team of 85 lawyers
description: Binance has appointed Eleanor Hughes as the new general counsel. Hughes will lead a battery of 85 lawyers

title: Former Celsius CEO Arrested and Sued by SEC After a Probe into the Company’s Collapse
